item.title: GoogleCTF Beginner's Quest 2019 - Drive to the Target
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Description Excellent work! With your fine sleuthing skills, you managed to find a picture of the handsome creature with its pet biped. At last friends and companionship may be near! Like all inhabitants of this world, you spend an inordinate amount of time on the site, stalking and comparing your life to that of others. The first thought that springs to your mind is “Why haven’t I ever been to Mauritius on holiday?
